changelog:
- Old 2016 theme: Added a red stripe to the top of dialog boxes, and made the backgrounds of the Freelancer item info boxes use the same filter as the inventory
- Both themes: Fixed the colors of the contract lookup and missing DLC dialog boxes
- General: Fixed the localization of the "Difficulty Level" text on the 2016-style destination tiles, and added a Chinese translation to the mod, which was provided to me by Nexus user SunnyPigPig
- (All changes in this log are from 2.3.2, except the Chinese translation, which was 2.3.3)
